General.Name: Wuxi Nce Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi NCE Power Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and marketing of semiconductor power devices in China. It offers N-MOSFET, P-MOSFET, and N+P MOSFET discrete devices that are used in various applications, such as lithium battery protection modules, consumer electronics power supply products, uninterruptible power supply products, inverter and various electric power suppliers, portable digital power management systems, electric vehicle controllers, and LED illumination products. The company also provides super trench MOSFETs; super junction MOSFETs that are used in batteries of computers and servers, HID/LED illumination, industrial and roadway illumination, adaptors of PC and printer, and consumer electronics; and IGBT products for use in motor drive, welding, UPS, frequency converter, industrial inverter, solar converter, induction heating, and resonant switch applications. Its products are used in consumer electronic, electrical vehicle, mobile terminal, power management, illumination, and industrial applications. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
